html:
10.16.20  6:01 pm   Do you believe in infinity?

      yes, and it clobbers me every waking second

10.16.20  5:18 pm   What are you doing now?

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

10.16.20  5:06 pm   is art artistic?

      let me perform some calculations

10.16.20  4:52 pm   do you actually answer these questions every 5 minutes to 5 hours

      every 2 seconds to 30 hours

10.16.20  4:52 pm   How do you feel about the trombone?

      pretty good

10.16.20  4:01 pm   what are mushrooms?

      they are the common ancestor between a tree and a hat

10.16.20  3:31 pm   whats your favorite meme

      clothes

10.16.20  3:08 pm   How do you get inspiration for your songs?

      you've heard of dumpster diving, well i've actually drilled a hole in the bottom of the dumpster so as to enter from underneath

10.16.20  3:06 pm   What is the most boring word?

      iconic

10.16.20  2:14 pm   Where did all the good times go?

      they are following you

10.16.20  2:07 pm   was sliced bread ever the greatest thing at a point in time?

      2nd best. best thing was sports

10.16.20  2:06 pm   what is the best adjective

      good

10.16.20  12:46 pm   HELP! I AM AN EXTROVERT AND I HAVE BEEN STUCK IN MY ROOM WITH AN OLD PARROT AND A MOOSHY APPLE FOR 6 MONTHS AND NOW THAT I STARTED GOING AGAIN TO REGULAR SCHOOL IS LIKE I DON'T AND MY SOSIAL SKILLS HAVE DROPPED FROM A GOOD 89% TO 73% ! WHAT SHOULD I DO?!

      how about starting a pod cast with guests

10.16.20  11:52 am   Thoughts on using Gb major instead of F# major as the key signature?

      if you think there's any chance it will go minor, you might want to use F# or else it could get weird

10.16.20  11:21 am   You often answer in a non-sensical manner.

     this is to distract from all the times when i've made way too much sense

      Are you being playful, trying to be insightful or not wanting to give effort?

     i suffer from a general condition where i actually give too much effort. so you may catch me exercising some of my coping mechanisms against that, which i also put too much effort into

10.16.20  11:05 am   how the heck is possible that you play bass so well 

      if you listen to 20,000 songs or more you automatically become good at bass

10.16.20  10:45 am   what is your favourite kind of cereal

      pizza pineapple

10.16.20  9:40 am   opinion on leggings?

      can hardly imagine any other way to leg a leg

10.16.20  9:03 am   thoughts on alchemy? 

      seems legit

10.16.20  8:56 am   will you ever have a favorite song if you're favorite song is going to be a song that you will make in the future?

      the idea is to make all of them

10.16.20  8:11 am   on one of these you made a comment about keyboards being friendly (may have even said "the friendliest instrument"), have you evaluated the friendliness level of any of your other instruments?

      i have some friendly lights. one of the secrets to friendly lights, i've found, is to get them from the home supplies store and not the video production store

10.16.20  8:05 am   I've recently discovered music and would like to make some. Any tips on how to get started? 

      that's the one part i don't remember

10.16.20  7:24 am   what is the new editing software you are using?

      greed

10.16.20  6:56 am   your Music has helped me through SoMe of the moST DIFficult momENTs of my lIfe. whaT can my DiFfiCUlt moments DO for youR music?

      help me get through it

10.16.20  6:49 am   How the fuck do I begin writing a song

      you may never know. but that won't stop you from doing it. the only problem is, it will happen when you least expect it, so you need to be lightning quick on the documentation, and also organized. save them for when you are ready to write, then you won't have to worry about starting the song, you'll have many of them started already. which should bring you to your next problem, which is how the heck do you select a song

10.16.20  5:32 am   How much human contact is necessary?

      just enough to remember it

10.16.20  5:11 am   Why is "La De Da De Da De Da De Day Oh" the best song you have ever written?

      that's just a natural property of songs in general. every song is the best song ever written. this may seem like a paradox, but quantum mechanics tells us it's true

10.16.20  5:10 am   You are an inspiration.

What inspires you?

      whenever i walk inside or outside, or through doors in general

10.16.20  4:38 am   what is your favorite article of clothing?

      the body

10.16.20  3:26 am   Im a hidden gem amoung other ytchannels I mostly do songs that are sarcastic a bit so my question is have you ever used a B major or B minor in one of your songs?

      yes

10.16.20  2:21 am   Why are your videos meaningless?

      probably because you don't like them

10.16.20  2:17 am   What animating tool do you use

      greed

10.16.20  1:24 am   How to type faster?

      that all depends how you currently do it

10.16.20  1:10 am   "make some parts of the song more boring so the good parts sound even better" - have you used this in your music?

     absolutely

     if so, what's one example?

     Tuesday

10.16.20  12:37 am   what mic do you use for singing and dialogue

     regular

      and is your room treated? 

      no, but i have a box that's treated so i just climb inside of the box. however, you have probably not heard any of the recordings since the box

10.16.20  12:33 am   if I was making a short video game what music would I add to it? 

      here's a twist, you could add really long music

10.15.20  11:53 pm   How do you find inspiration?

     i have a bucket to catch the inspiration but sometimes the bucket itself inspires me

      What mostly influence your thoughts? 

      it seems like everything, but that's probably just because i haven't thought as much about the things i haven't thought about, if that makes sense

10.15.20  11:37 pm   Are you usually writing lyrics with intent, or are you just putting down whatever feels right at the time/fits within the tempo of the song?

      those sound suspiciously like intents to me, but, i have also additional intents. it's more like one huge giant vat, of liquid intent

10.15.20  11:36 pm   opinions on the holland tunnel

      it's easy to pay in exact change, because the fee is exactly 100 dollars

10.15.20  11:30 pm   do you have a certain way to deal with lots of stress?

      i have multiple ways but they don't always work

10.15.20  11:24 pm   what's your favorite socratic dialogue?

      the one where he says books aren't literature

10.15.20  11:22 pm   How much soap do you own

      just enough

10.15.20  11:21 pm   Can you respond to this and what is the idea behind your neon aesthetics?

      what the heck is a neon aesthetic

10.15.20  10:48 pm   what is your opinion on the singularity?

      seems legit

10.15.20  10:42 pm   i remember you made a lot of videos over the years of your journey of trying to break the small song habit and make longer songs. i keep making 4-8 bar loops and want to just work on a song to just finish the thing, but i have a hard time doing so. do you have any tips?

      yes, my remedy for this is write the whole thing before you even touch the recording. write it all the way through and make sure you know the entire road map. like don't say 'and then i guess we'll probably repeat the last chorus'. no, write the whole thing all the way through the end. then once it's done, you have to figure out how to record what you wrote. it sounds to me like you are trying to write the song from inside the sequencer, which is why they might be sounding very much like a sequencer

10.15.20  10:28 pm   Are you real or are you magic?

      i wonder if anyone is allowed to be both

10.15.20  10:14 pm   Any idea on when your new video will be out?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

10.15.20  9:49 pm   I'd Like to say that my favorite song of yours is "La de Da de Da de Da de Day oh" because of that beautiful high part in the chorus, but I always know that as a fellow artist we all want to improve. So I'd like to ponder about what you'd think you'd improve in the song? Or anything in General.

      i tend to regret making the last verse (quiet verse) so entirely naked. i mean of course it's supposed to be the quiet half-verse, etc, but it's just TOO empty, in the online part. the other thing, paradoxically, that i regret, is how unthinkably long the project took to make. i still to this day don't understand how this could happen

10.15.20  9:40 pm   Is the song "Might Quit" based off of past experiences?

      it's more based on feelings actually

10.15.20  9:12 pm   the next edition of the real book should contain "the road" by Bill Wurtz, do you agree?

      it would probably not be polite for me to claim my song should be in someone's book
